EmailTemplate.description: Email template that can be used to send to a customer as to how to log in GFV
EmailTemplate.name: Customer Log in Assistance
EmailTemplate.subject: Instructions to Access Global FoundryView
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
We understand that you may be having problems logging into Global FoundryView. The instructions below should guide you through the process.
LOG IN
Please navigate to the following url, www.g-fv.com. Recommended browsers are the most recent versions of Chrome and Firefox. Latest version of IE is also supported, but certain security and privacy settings may cause some pages to only partially render. Your user name is: {!Contact.User_Name__c}
PASSWORD RESET
If you forgotten your password, please click “Reset password?” located next to the orange “Sign In” button.
Enter your login, {!Contact.User_Name__c}, and registered email address {!Contact.Email}. Please proceed to change your temporary password as soon as possible.
CHANGING PASSWORD
Once you have logged in with your temporary password, you should change it as soon as possible to a password that you can remember.
In the Home Page, you will see a quick link on the left hand column that says "Change My Password"
Follow the instructions to change your password.
If are still having trouble logging in, please contact your Account Team representative. Provide the following basic information and screenshots highlighting the issue.
Your Name Company Email address User Name used for log in. Browser used Description of where you encountered issues. Any screenshots that would help us isolate the issue.
Global FoundryView Support Team.
